channel.title: CVE Feed for Everest themes -- GuCherry Blog
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Everest themes -- GuCherry Blog

item.title: CVE-2024-32531|2024-04-17T09:31:11.094Z -- Everest themes -- GuCherry Blog
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Everest themes GuCherry Blog allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects GuCherry Blog: from n/a through 1.1.8.
